concept: 108 Stars of Destiny (108 Suhojeon Stars / 108 흉성)

origin.historical_reference: Bandit Leader Song Jiang and his 36/108 followers.

narrative_usage.general_rule: Rarely depicts all 108 stars. Usually selects specific stars to define a character's innate destiny or curse.
narrative_usage.flexibility: Except for well-known stars like Cheonsalseong, authors adapt the abilities based on the Chinese character's meaning.

major_archetypes.name: 천살성 (Cheonsalseong / Heavenly Killer Star / 天殺星)
major_archetypes.core_trait: Innate Murderous Intent (Killing Aura / 殺氣)
characteristics: Loss of reason/Berserk mode upon seeing blood.
major_archetypes.awakening_trigger: Traumatic event (e.g., Death of family), or realizing the destiny late in life.

structural_template.description: Template for authors to create custom star effects.
